#summary stdlib for AS3.

= About =

*stdlib* is the general purpose standard library in C, look at [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stdlib.h stdlib.h].

*package* C.stdlib

{{{public const EXIT_SUCCESS:int}}}
Success termination code.

== EXIT_FAILURE ==
{{{public const EXIT_FAILURE:int}}}

{{{public function abort():void}}}

{{{public function exit( status:int = -1 ):void}}}

== getenv ==
{{{public function getenv( name:String ):String}}}
